resources.string: Creates a chathead bubble that will allow you to quickly open and close the app on top of any other app
Move SlideOver to the left or right side of the screen
Adjust where SlideOver appears on the vertical axis
Adjust how much of the SlideOver bubble is visible on the screen
Distance on screen that you have to pull to activate SlideOver
Adjust how big the conversation arc is on the screen
SlideOver is still heavily under development. Do not submit requests, or even suggestions, for it at this time.
Choose the action that occurs when you have activated the dashed part of the SlideOver arc
Closes the popup after you have replied to a message
Adjusts the height of the SlideOver popup on screen.
Adjust the width of the SlideOver popup on screen.
Only show the popup when you have unlocked the device and there is a new message, otherwise let the SlideOver bubble handle new messages
Click here for a list of features and knowledge about using SlideOver and Quick Peek to their full potential
Show contact pictures on incoming messages

Automatically reset the sliver to the normal position after the following amount of time (configurable with \"Show All Settings\" enabled). Applies after a new message has come in and the SlideOver bubble pings out.
Sets the SlideOver bubble to the new sliver width if there is a new message when the screen is unlocked. Timeout settings will apply

Use this option if the SlideOver Messaging bubble disappears after so long on your screen. It is because the system is killing the service used to create it. This option will get around that by putting a persistent notification on your notification tray. It will not work on Android 4.0.
Disables access to the SlideOver popup from the SlideOver bubble so Quick Peek is the only thing accessible.
Will split messages into compatible lengths. For use if you have trouble sending long messages with your carrier
You may have to adjust this if the contacts don\'t fit on the screen correctly
A single tap on the SlideOver bubble will open the new Quick Peek window to view recent conversations
Only show unread messages in the SlideOver Quick Peek
Warning: you will have no way to move the bubble around with this option enabled

Check this option if nothing appears in Quick Peek when you tap the SlideOver bubble. Cation: This may stop notifications from your main SMS app, so you will ONLY be notified from the SlideOver bubble. This is how it must be done so you don\'t receive two messages and there is no workaround.
